attributes.additional_details: The normal person who has to drive to work is being crippled with rising fuel prices as well as increased national insurance and massive jump in inflation
attributes.background: I want the government to reduce some of the taxation on fuel. We are paying around 57% tax on a litre of fuel. This is not right at the price just now

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
